ygData.subject: Re: Sugar Daddy Sparx
ygData.msgSnippet: I am SOOOOOOO Jealous! I knew I shouldn t have moved to Tunare! (Actually, My ranger on Mith Marr had a fair bit of similar luck getting a PGT and a SBS in the
ygData.messageBody:
I am SOOOOOOO Jealous! I knew I shouldn't have
moved to Tunare! (Actually, My ranger on Mith Marr had
a fair bit of similar luck getting a PGT and a SBS
in the same day!) Don't you just love the PGT? Have
fun with it, I'm sure it'll save your butt as much as
it does mine!<br><br>Taniz<br>15th Ranger on Mith
Marr<br><br>Arrelna<br>8th Enchanter on Mith Marr<br><br>Moradin<br>10th
Paladin on Tunare<br>The Pygmy
Coalition<br><br>and....<br><br>Kullervo<br>7th Bard on Tunare<br><br>(Can anyone say
MPD?)<br>Ha!
